metadata.description: Pre-Entry Threat Assessment Checklist - Source of truth for all entry criteria
metadata.purpose: Structured checklist data (not hardcoded in HTML). Used by: command-center.html, trades_ledger.json compliance tracking, rules_database compliance scoring, EOD wrap validation.

checklist.pass_criteria: For extension SELL setups: items 1-12 PLUS 13-15 (extension sell items). For pullback BUY setups: items 1-12 PLUS 16-17 (pullback buy items). ALL applicable items must be checked before entry.

items.description: Price closed below level, retested, confirmed breakdown/breakup
items.why_matters: Prevents premature entries into false breakdowns

items.description: What is current RSI? Extremes (>80 or <20) = divergence risk
items.why_matters: Identifies overbought/oversold = reversal vulnerability. Divergence confirmation signal.

items.description: Are we at 50% Fibonacci pullback zone? (Confluence point)
items.why_matters: Classic support/resistance zone where reversions often stall or confirm

items.description: Are we at Fib extension targets? (Reversal zones / Stop placement)
items.why_matters: Extensions mark where moves exhaust. Use as entry trigger or stop placement.

items.description: Price making higher high, but RSI/momentum lower = bearish divergence (vice versa for bullish)
items.why_matters: Early reversal signal. Requires 3-candle confirmation (Rule #19) before acting.

items.description: Price extended beyond VWAP bands (upper/lower). Yellow/Orange/Red arrows = coming back to VWAP = mean reversion opportunity
items.why_matters: Formal signal from VWAP mean reversion system. Green arrow (up), Yellow (weak), Orange (medium), Red (strong). Guides entry timing into reversion zones.
items.script_reference: Smart Mean Reversion with VWAP Guide

categories.name: MOMENTUM & VOLUME
categories.description: Confirmation of move direction through volume and momentum

items.description: 5-min 200 EMA: must be falling for shorts, rising for longs
items.why_matters: Prevents trading against trend. Filters out counter-trend noise.

items.description: Entry bar volume must be at least 1.3x the 20-bar average
items.why_matters: Confirms conviction. Low volume entries often fail.

items.description: Advance-Decline line: improving for longs, declining for shorts
items.why_matters: Validates broad market support. Don't fade improving breadth.

categories.name: MARKET CONTEXT
categories.description: Macro setup, signal tier, volatility regime

items.description: Current market signal must be MODERATE or higher (not WEAK/AVOID)
items.why_matters: Respects system signal. Don't force trades in weak signal environments.

items.description: Are we aligned with daily/weekly trend? Or intentionally counter-trend? Document either way.
items.why_matters: Counter-trend trades need extra confluences and half-size. Alignment trades get full size.

items.description: Market regime: In consolidation/squeeze? Breakout direction confirmed? Volatility expanding?
items.why_matters: Ranges ≠ trend trades. Breakouts = momentum. Squeezes = breakout imminent. Different strategies.

categories.name: FIBONACCI REVERSION FRAMEWORK (Rule #20)
categories.description: Two-way systematic framework: SELL extensions with divergence, BUY pullbacks at hard levels

items.description: Price extended to 127% or 168% Fibonacci extension of prior move. Use fib_levels from chart.
items.why_matters: Extensions exhaust momentum. Natural reversal entry zone. Must combine with bearish divergence.

items.description: Price at extension making higher high, but RSI/momentum lower. 5-min timeframe divergence present.
items.why_matters: Divergence at extension = confirmed momentum failure. Dual entry signal: (1) extension, (2) divergence.

items.description: VWAP script showing arrow signal indicating price extended, re-entering VWAP band = mean reversion trigger.
items.why_matters: Confirms that price is in extension zone and reverting. Formal confirmation of reversion thesis.

items.description: After selling extension, calculate where 50%-61.8% pullback would be. Identify the retrace zone.
items.why_matters: Defines where next opportunity appears. Natural profit-taking zone. Buyers emerge here.

items.description: Does 50%-61.8% pullback zone hit HARD LEVEL? (Weekly high/low, monthly high/low, prior support/resistance, EMA)
items.why_matters: Pullback MUST hit structure, not arbitrary 50%. Structure + pullback + confluence = high-probability buy.

categories.name: RISK MANAGEMENT
categories.description: Position sizing, stop placement, capital allocation

items.description: Position sized for $231 risk (1% of account). Stop pre-set. Capital verified.
items.why_matters: Enforces discipline. No surprises on loss size.

compliance_tracking.how_to_use: For EXTENSION SELL entries (Rule #20): Check items 1-12 (general) + 13-15 (extension-specific) = 15 items. For PULLBACK BUY entries (Rule #20): Check items 1-12 (general) + 16-17 (pullback-specific) = 14 items. ALL must be TRUE before entry.

scoring.extension_sell_15_15: READY - Enter short at extension with high confidence
scoring.extension_sell_14_15: WAIT - Missing one item, review before entry
scoring.extension_sell_13_or_less: DO NOT ENTER - Fix before entry
scoring.pullback_buy_14_14: READY - Enter long at pullback+structure with high confidence
scoring.pullback_buy_13_14: WAIT - Missing one item, review before entry
scoring.pullback_buy_12_or_less: DO NOT ENTER - Fix before entry

compliance_tracking.linking_to_trades: After trade closes, log in trades_ledger.json which items were checked vs skipped. Use for post-trade analysis.

integration_points.command_center_html: Load this checklist dynamically (todo: update HTML loader)
integration_points.trades_ledger_json: Log compliance scorecard for each trade (which items checked before entry)
integration_points.rules_database_json: Link each checklist item to relevant rules
integration_points.eod_wrap: Validate that all high-compliance trades checked all 12 items
